definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
to be born under an unlucky star (usu. of women)/to be born unlucky
heaven is jealous of heroic genius (idiom); the great have great hardship to contend with/those whom the Gods love die young
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
to be born under an ill star
lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: even heroes have a weakness for the charms of a beautiful woman (idiom)
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 nan2 guo4 mei3 ren2 guan1
